Description:
PMBG170222/1-312310758
The Forklift Truck has failed its thorough examination and test and the dangerous defects have not been repaired because you have failed to maintain the forklift truck in an official state in efficient working order and good repair

PMBG170222/2-312310995
Person operating forklift trucks have not received training in their safe operation because there are no persons who have received adequate training for the purposes of health and safety including training in the methods which may be adopted when using the forklift trucks, any risks such use may entail and precautions to be taken

IMBG080322/1-312332352
You have failed to ensure the health, safety and welfare of your employees in that you have failed to ensure that employees exposed to wood dust, a substance that is hazardous to health, are under suitable health surveillance

IMBG080322/2-312332364
You have failed to ensure that the local exhaust ventilation systems provided for the control of wood dust which is a substance hazardous to health has undergone a thorough examination and test within the last 14 months by a person who is competent to do so
